titleStmt.title: A full and true account of a terrible and bloody engagement at sea, between a squadron of the French fleet and the naval forces under the command of our English admiral together with a particular account of the sinking of three of the French men of war, taking of two, and disabling most of therest [sic], with the great courage and bravery of our English sea-men / in a letter to an eminent merchant in the city of London.
titleStmt.author: J. H.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: stained, with print show-through and loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
